Neil Patil


Hey there, I'm Neil. I like running, building things, and Mexican food. I am a Turing Scholar studying Computer Science at the University of Texas at Austin.

I've spent a lot of my life doing tech, particularly software - last summer I worked at Google as a SWE. Since then, I've decided I want to learn things outside of the web and mobile software engineering domain. I'm currently interested in security, drones, and robot learning.

If you'd like to find out more about me, here's my Github, my resume, and my email.
